text: Nanjing University is one of the oldest universities in China. It is in Nanjing. It started in 258 CE. In 1902, it became a new-type school when the Qing Dynasty ended. Nanjing University has two campuses. They are the Gulou campus, which is in the center of Nanjing City; and Xianlin, in the northeast of Nanjing. Category:Colleges and universities in the People's Republic of China Category:250s establishments Category:Establishments in China Category:3rd-century establishments in Asia Category:Nanjing
title: Nanjing University
